about_the_game:
You are a masseuse.

Oh... it seems a new employee who is tired of society has come to your store. Provide her with the ultimate healing with your massage! !

The controls are simple.

You can give any type of massage to a character that moves smoothly with Live2D, using just one mouse. Drowning in pleasure, she will accept your "special massage"...

Game system

Full animation with Live2D! Collision detection is set for various parts such as the head, buttocks, chest, thighs, etc. You can easily massage each part by dragging it. Animations are created in real time based on the part, favorability, and your operation!

Likeability

Her likability will change by giving her a massage. As the favorability increases, she will accept more extreme massages. In addition, favorability is converted into MASSAGE POINTS, and you can unlock various items and actions.

Customization

You can adjust the various parts that make up the facial expression. Try making the expression to your liking. You can also set steam, pubic hair, and the transparency of the man.

Photo shooting function

A UI so realistic that it feels like you're taking a sex video with your smartphone. You can choose between PNG and GIF as the save format.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains adult themes, nude women, erotic massages, and sexual acts. All characters are over 18 years old.

name: SKETCHY MASSAGE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit OS
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Massage a slimy moving character with Live2D using simple mouse operations! Your massage will make her body and soul fall in pleasure!
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
